notes: Alias resolution is one-hop: canonical = engine_alias_map.get(input_code_or_label, input_code_or_label).
This v1 map is generated from engines.json observed_in_fitment.engine_label values that map uniquely to a single engine_code.
Ambiguous labels (one label -> multiple engine_codes) are intentionally excluded to avoid incorrect matches.
US-only scope: do not add aliases for non-US-only engines or ROW market variants.
